text: The Little Bridge, Musée des Beaux-Arts de Strasbourg Gillis Rombouts (1630, Haarlem - 1678, Haarlem), was a Dutch Golden Age landscape painter. ==Biography== According to the RKD he painted landscapes and beach scenes.Gillis Rombouts in the RKD He was followed by his son, the painter Salomon Rombouts. ==References== *Gillis Rombouts on Artnet Category:1630 births Category:1678 deaths Category:Dutch Golden Age painters Category:Dutch male painters Category:Dutch landscape painters Category:Artists from Haarlem
title: Gillis Rombouts
